title: My special family
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction in youth
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social interaction in youth
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm life - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children and animals
abstract: A tribute to a very special family.
description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. From her family, Erin has learnt responsibility, empathy, the realities of life and death and, most importantly, love and friendship. Here she pays tribute to the members of this special family.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001927; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; To be Catalogued; 2009
